ModMetaData.name: Definitely More Cannons
ModMetaData.author: Faryzal2020
ModMetaData.description:
Current Version: v1.6.0.3 (5 March 2019)

A mod that adds more cannon turrets, both manned and unmanned separated into several different types. Intended to be used from mid to late game. And also recommended to be used along with other mods that adds new pawns that are more difficult to kill than mechanoid centipedes.
 Does not compatible with Combat Extended and SYR's Bullet Casings
